name: suzette scrunchie
sizes_available: finished scrunchie measures approximately 5 inches in diameter
notes:
> you are very welcome to join our
> growing facebook community! share
> project photos and connect with other
> crocheters in a positive and
> encouraging environment. [click
> here!][1]

> an ad-free, printer friendly .pdf
> version of this pattern is available
> in my etsy shop [click here to find
> sweet bee crochet on etsy.][2]

crochet a cute scrunchie using the suzette stitch. this scrunchie works well on its own for pony tails or as an accent around a bun hairstyle style for a pop of colour. use your favourite worsted weight yarn in cotton or acrylic. 


**inside the pattern you will find:**
- detailed written instructions
- clear photos
- required tools, approximate yardage required

**materials needed:**
- approximately 63 yards of worsted weight yarn (cotton or acrylic)
- 4.5mm hook
- 2 inch hair (diameter) hair elastic or elastic cord cut and seamed to preferred size
- yarn needle
- scissors
- measuring tape
